languages.text: "Мне удалось убедить собратьев обратить реку их гнева в иное русло. Отряды Изгоев прибудут в Простор, тихие и незримые. Но не ради войны — они отыщут и заберут с собой тех, кто остался. Последних сынов и дочерей Крудараха. А затем бесследно покинут звезды мон-кай. Навсегда".

"I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."
languages.original_text: "Мне удалось убедить собратьев обратить реку их гнева в иное русло. Отряды Изгоев прибудут в Простор, тихие и незримые. Но не ради войны — они отыщут и заберут с собой тех, кто остался. Последних сынов и дочерей Крудараха. А затем бесследно покинут звезды мон-кай. Навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The Exile cohorts will arrive to the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will leave the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «He convencido a los míos para que encaucen de otro modo el río de su cólera. Las filas de los proscritos llegarán a la Extensión, invisibles e inaudibles. Pero no para librar una guerra, sino para localizar y evacuar a los pocos que quedamos. Los últimos hijos e hijas de Crudarach. Y después se marcharán de las estrellas mon-keigh sin dejar rastro. Para siempre».
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: «He convencido a los míos para que encaucen de otro modo el río de su cólera. Las cohortes proscritas llegarán a la Extensión, invisibles e inaudibles. Pero no para librar una guerra, sino para localizar y evacuar a los pocos que quedamos. Los últimos hijos e hijas de Crudarach. Y después se marcharán de las estrellas mon-keigh sin dejar rastro. Para siempre».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我说服了我的族人们，转移了他们愤怒的洪流。流浪者的分队会悄无声息地抵达扩区，但他们不会挑起战争。他们会找到剩下的幸存者，将克鲁达拉赫最后的子嗣带走，之后不留痕迹地离开猴子的群星，再也不会回来了。”
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: “我说服了我的族人们，转移了他们愤怒的洪流。流浪者的分队会悄无声息地抵达扩区，但并不是为了开战。他们会找到剩下的幸存者，将克鲁达拉赫最后的子嗣带走，之后不留痕迹地离开猴子的群星，再也不会回来了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai convaincu mes semblables de dévier le cours de leur colère. Les Errants arriveront dans les Étendues sans se faire remarquer, mais pas pour y guerroyer, simplement pour retrouver les derniers enfants de Crudarach et les emmener. Ils quitteront alors les étoiles des mon-keigh sans laisser de trace. Pour toujours. »
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai convaincu mes semblables de dévier le cours de leur colère. Les cohortes d'Errants arriveront dans les Étendues sans se faire remarquer, mais pas pour y guerroyer, simplement pour retrouver les derniers enfants de Crudarach et les emmener. Ils quitteront alors les étoiles des mon-keigh sans laisser de trace. Pour toujours. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私は血族を説得し、彼らの怒りの流れを迂回させたのだ。追放者たちの一団が、人知れず、密やかに、エクスパンスに到着する。しかし戦争のためではない。彼らは残った者たちを見つけ、連れていくのだ。クルダラの最後の息子や娘たちを。そして、彼らは跡形もなくモン＝ケイの星を去るだろう。永遠に」
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: 「私は血族を説得し、彼らの怒りの流れを迂回させたのだ。追放者たちの一団が、人知れず、密やかに、エクスパンスに到着する。しかし戦争のためではない。彼らは残った者たちを見つけ、連れていくのだ。クルダラの最後の息子や娘たちを。そして、彼らは跡形もなくモン＝ケイの星を去るだろう。永遠に」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe mein Volk überzeugt, den Fluss ihres Zorns umzuleiten. Die Ausgestoßenen werden ungesehen und ungehört in der Ausdehnung eintreffen. Doch nicht, um Krieg zu führen. Sie werden jene finden und mitnehmen, die noch verbleiben. Die letzten Söhne und Töchter von Crudarach. Und dann werden sie die Sterne der Chem-Pan-Sey spurlos verlassen. Für immer."
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mein Volk überzeugt, den Fluss ihres Zorns umzuleiten. Die Kohorten der Ausgestoßenen werden ungesehen und ungehört in der Ausdehnung eintreffen. Doch nicht, um Krieg zu führen. Sie werden jene finden und mitnehmen, die noch verbleiben. Die letzten Söhne und Töchter von Crudarach. Und dann werden sie die Sterne der Chem-Pan-Sey spurlos verlassen. Für immer."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soydaşlarımı öfkelerini başka bir tarafa yönlendirmeye ikna ettim. Enginlik'e görülmemiş ve duyulmamış Yurtsuz safları akın edecek. Ancak sırf savaş uğruna değil, Crudarach'ın geriye kalan son oğullarıyla kızlarını bulup yanlarında götürecekler. Ardından da mon-keigh yıldızlarını geride tek bir iz bırakmadan terk edecekler. Ebediyen..."
languages.original_text: "I convinced my kin to divert the river of their anger. The ranks of Outcasts will arrive in the Expanse, unseen and unheard. But not for the sake of war — they will find and take away those who remain. The last sons and daughters of Crudarach. And then they will depart the mon-keigh stars without a trace. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarımı öfkelerini başka bir tarafa yönlendirmeye ikna ettim. Enginlik'e görülmemiş ve duyulmamış Yurtsuz safları akın edecek. Ancak sırf savaş uğruna değil, Crudarach'ın geriye kalan son oğullarıyla kızlarını bulup yanlarında götürecekler. Ardından da mon-keigh yıldızlarını geride tek bir iz bırakmadan terk edecekler. Ebediyen..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
